description.translate: When a breastplate replaces the unalterable material of the foundations of the eternal kingdom.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Germe de Ulgok'keström\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Quand une cuirasse se substitue à la matière\"}","{\"text\":\"§7inaltérable des fondations du sempiternel royaume.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7When a breastplate replaces the unalterable material\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of the foundations of the eternal kingdom.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HER§a2 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
